熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會主場為熱刺球場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」


榮譽：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984
賽馬會傑志中心挑戰盃 冠軍：2017/2018
國際冠軍盃 冠軍：2018/2019

replies.msg:
其實政府一定唔會認同呢五大要求 因為佢定性左示威者係暴徒 放火 掉石入警署 掉國旗 仲有之前沖立法會 佢係一定一定一定唔會應承 面對現實 佢應承即係向佢口中既暴徒低頭 如果要達成呢五大訴求 我覺得大家至少要有個心理準備 真係要架空呢個政府/真係取代呢個政府
而家係兩方都冇退路 政府唔會低頭 我地唔會放棄 但消耗得最快係前線既人 一個一個比人拉 警察又長期緊繃狀態 黑社會又出黎打市民 人鬥人 冇解決既方案

Spurs in late Hysaj move?
By Football Italia staff

Tottenham Hotspur are being linked with a late move for Napoli defender Elseid Hysaj.

Tottenham are in need of right-back reinforcements after selling Kieran Trippier and losing Juan Foyth to injury, while Serge Aurier is being tipped for a return to Paris Saint-Germain.

Now, according to Goal.com and the Evening Standard, Spurs have expressed an interest in Hysaj with just a day until the English transfer window closes for the summer.

The Albanian has long been expected to leave Napoli, who already have a replacement in ex-Empoli full-back Giovanni Di Lorenzo.

However, Goal.com warns the Partenopei want £23m (€25m) for the 25-year-old, while a transfer is ‘complicated’ and ‘some way from completion’ in the Evening Standard’s eyes.

In the meantime, Spurs are hopeful of wrapping up a deal for Juventus forward Paulo Dybala.

Tottenham in Dybala race against time
By Football Italia staff

Paulo Dybala is open to joining Tottenham Hotspur, claim Italian sources, but it’s unlikely Spurs and Juventus will sort out the details in time.

According to Sportitalia, Il Messaggero and more, Dybala turned down Manchester United, but would be ready to sign for last season’s Champions League Finalists for €70m.

The main problem remains his wage demands, the €15m commission for his agent and above all the issue of image rights.

Dybala is currently being sued by his former agency for breach of contract and could be on the hook for €40m if he sells his image rights on without their permission.

Italian sources maintain negotiations are on-going and the image rights are also being discussed, but it’s a race to finish everything by the Premier League transfer deadline, which is tomorrow at 17.00 UK time.

As things stand and realising the complex state of Dybala’s affairs, not to mention the fact Spurs tend to be quite parsimonious when it comes to wages, it still looks unlikely this transfer will go through.

According to Sky Sports UK, Tottenham received another blow with news Philippe Coutinho turned down a loan move from Barcelona.

They are still pursuing another target, Giovani Lo Celso of Real Betis.

Watch Serie A live in the UK on Premier Sports. https://subscribe.premiersports.tv/

熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會主場為熱刺球場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」


榮譽：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984
賽馬會傑志中心挑戰盃 冠軍：2017/2018
國際冠軍盃 冠軍：2018/2019
